name: Team Rocket’s Articuno
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: This Pokémon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.

abilities.name: Repelling Veil
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent’s Pokémon done to your Basic Team Rocket’s Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

attacks.name: Dark Frost
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any Team Rocket’s Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.
